The grand question concerning taking up armes against the King ansvvered, by application of the holy Scriptures to the conscience of every subject.
[2], 6 [i.e. 12] p.
Printed [by Leonard Lichfield], [Oxford] : in the yeare of our Lord M DC XLIII. [1643]
Place of publication and printer's name from Wing. P. 12 misnumbered 6. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
